verbs.description: [ARG0: MSNBC ’s Nicolle Wallace] [V: called] out [ARG1: Donald Trump] [ARG2: for being a liar] [ARGM-TMP: on Friday] and refused to read his tweets out loud because they are more like “ fairy tales and fantasy ” at this point .
